name: VR Street Jump for Google Cardboard
name_original: VR Street Jump for Google Cardboard
description:
A remake of the classic frog road jumping game in first person 3D virtual reality for Google Cardboard.


Press the Cardboard trigger to jump and scross the street! Look in the direction you want to go and hit the trigger. Don't get hit by cars, trains, trucks or taxis.


Compare your high score with your friends, see who is the ultimate virtual reality VR Road player.


COMPATIBLE VR HEADSETS
Google Cardboard
Merge VR
Stooksy
Durovis Dive
Refugio 3D
VRTX One
ANTVR
VR Smartview
ColorCross
VRTRIA
Nibiru
